title: Tourist Bungalow for Sale
details:
Here is your chance to own a bungalow in a wonderful location in Sri Lanka!

Wonderful bungalow for vacation to entire family. Large balconies without door sitting and hammocks. Triple room has one double beds, 4 roomed bungalow accommodates 12 guests. Very privacy good rooms for the families with children.

Investment for this Bungalow is just 65 Million LKR

This is a top rated bungalow in Bookings.com and Tripadvisor.com too!

Please Contact TSL Property on: 077-8973140 / 011-2677534 / 076-6787070 (Whatsapp / Viber)

If You Are Interested, All You Have To Do Is Sending Us a Simple E-mail To: tslpro73@gmail.com, Specifying Your Requirements. We Are Always Happy To Help You, Absolutely For Free!
